comments: Svitlana Mikolayivna is transliteration from Ukranian. Svetlana Nikolaevna is transliteration from Russian.
examples: Anemone biflora var. petiolulosa ( Juz.) Ziman in Thaiszia, 8(1): 67 (1998).
source: IK db. Index Herb. ed. 8. Ukray. Biokhim. Zhur. 63: 279ff. 2006. 70th Anniversary & 45 years of Scientifuc work in Ukr. Bot.Zhurn., 63(2): 279-285 (2006), incl. port. & bibliogr.
